channel.title: Lisa Raitt
channel.description: Recent news about Lisa Raitt, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Passing through the lobby 299 Queen St.W and saw the ladies of The Social getting ready for their show. Saw @LaineyGossip! #imafan

item.title: Mentioned by InsideHalton.com
item.description:
Halton MP's visit a fitting tribute to Hanna's leadership
The event will feature Halton MP and Federal Minister of Transport Lisa Raitt as the keynote speaker. “We are honoured to host Ms. Raitt,” said Julia Hanna, Oakville Chamber of Commerce Chair. “The chamber is thrilled to provide this rare opportunity to our ...

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: +1@Min_Lebel: Depuis 2006 notre gouv a investi plus de 4,5G$ en infrastructure au #GTA - 622M$ pour l'extension du métro Tor-York Spadina

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: +1"@Min_Lebel: Since 2006 approx. $2.2B in funding has been committed or invested by the Fed Gov for public transit in #GTA”

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: At the U13 Milton Stags Rep Basketball try-out. About 40 young men out there - one of them is mine! Good luck JC.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Ha!"@Justin_Ling: @davidakin Sydney, dude, Sydney. Don't make me go Cape Breton on you."

item.title: Mentioned by MetroNews Canada
item.description:
Windsor MP accuses Ambassador Bridge of 'gouging' travellers
In a letter to Transport Minister Lisa Raitt, Masse called the fare hike “an additional border tax that will take money out of the pockets of travellers, commuters and businesses.” The NDP MP is asking Raitt to use the authority of the International Bridges and ...
